title: Gameday Wrap - iPhone
custom_preconds:
Given a user an iPhone with MLB app installed 

User Logged in with valid subscriptions
custom_steps:
When a user taps on a game in Final from Scoreboard or Team Page
and the game has a Game Wrap published by Editorial
and a video

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user taps on a game in Final from Scoreboard or Team Page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The user should see an image thumbnail 
AND user should be able to Autoplay video

custom_steps_separated.content: AND Audio should be MUTED by default
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN audio will be muted after video autoplay start playing

custom_steps_separated.content: AND verify MUTE/UNMUTE button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN MUTE/UNMUTe button should display 
AND user able to MUTE/UNMUTE audio

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user rotates a video from landscape to portrait or portrait to landscape

Test both
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the video orientation will change and the overlays will be the same

custom_steps_separated.content: When user have selected On Mobile Dara and WiFi Connections for AUDIO/VIDEO Selection for Autoplay Video
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then video autoplays and there are no app crashes AND app behavior should be smooth AND Audio MUTED by default

custom_steps_separated.content: When user have selected On WiFi Connections Only for AUDIO/VIDEO Selection for Autoplay Video
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then video autoplays and there are no app crashes AND app behavior should be smooth AND audio MUTED by default

custom_steps_separated.content: When user have selected Never Autoplay Videos for AUDIO/VIDEO Selection for Autoplay Video
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then user won't be able to Autoplay video
AND user display with PLAY button to Manually PLAY video

title: News Article - iPhone
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with MLB app installed

https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/IAB-18842

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Newsreader
and taps on an article to open the article
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then that news article will open up
and a back button will display on the upper left of the article

custom_steps_separated.content: When user display with Video in News Article and Autoplay Videos enabled on Wifi or Data connection or Both
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Video autoplay AND Audio MUTED by default

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on a news article
and taps on the back button in the upper left of the article
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the article will slide from left to right
and you will be returned to the news index

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user selects the News menu
and selects a News article
and scrolls up and down on the news article
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the scrolling goes up and down accordingly
and the scroll is smooth

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user selects the News menu
and selects a News Article with a Video in it
and taps on the Video in the News Article
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Video autoplay successfully within it's window
and if we expand the video it will play in full screen AND muted by default

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user is playing the headline video inline and taps on the video to display the video controller UI
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video controller UI will appear onscreen with the following:

Top Overlay: Title, Chromecast ( * When device is connected to ChromeCast), Share
Bottom Overlay: Play/Pause, Elasped (M:SS), Scrubber, Remaining (M:SS), Toggle Full Screen, MUTE button

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is a Lite user
and selects the News menu
and selects a News Article
and scrolls to the end of the article
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then Next Article button should NOT be displayed (iPad Only)

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user navigates to an article and has tweets associated
custom_steps_separated.expected: The tweets must display inline within the News articles

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user navigates to an article and has photo(s)
custom_steps_separated.expected: The photo(s) should be able to display in-line within the news article

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user rotates a video from landscape to portrait or portrait to landscape

Test both
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the video orientation will change and the overlays will be the same

custom_steps_separated.content: When user have selected On Mobile Data and WiFi Connections for AUDIO/VIDEO Selection for Autoplay Video
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then video autoplays and there are no app crashes AND app behavior should be smooth AND Audio MUTED by default

custom_steps_separated.content: When user have selected  On WiFi Connections Only for AUDIO/VIDEO Selection for Autoplay Video
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then video autoplays and there are no app crashes AND app behavior should be smooth AND audio MUTED by default

custom_steps_separated.content: When user have selected Never Autoplay Videos for AUDIO/VIDEO Selection for Autoplay Video
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then user won't be able to Autoplay video AND user display with PLAY button to Manually PLAY video

title: Mute Button in Video Player
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone device with MLB app installed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to video content which supports autoplay
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should experience video autoplay functionality

custom_steps_separated.content: When audio from a video is playing, tapping on the mute button mutes audio from video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN tapping on mute button mutes the audio

custom_steps_separated.content: When audio from a video is muted, tapping on the mute button will unmute the audio from the video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN tapping on Unmute button will unmute the audios and user able to hear an audio

custom_steps_separated.content: When user autoplay videos
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Mute button should display on both portrait and landscape modes

custom_steps_separated.content: AND verify MUTE/UNMUTE functionality
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MUte/UNMUTE functionlaity should work as expected

title: Low Power Mode
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on an iPhone 
and At Bat 11.5 or higher is installed
and the user has Autoplay enabled in app Settings

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user's iPhone is in low power mode
and navs to video content which supports autoplay
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should experience normal video functionality
(no autoplay)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user leaves low power mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then autoplay functionality should resume

title: Team View - iPhone only
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user an iPhone with MLB app installed 

https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/IAB-18840

custom_steps_separated.content: When the Videos module of the Team page loads
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the top 5 videos from the team's video index in a 5 card carousel

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Videos within the Video module
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see a 5 card carousel with the following:
*video thumbnail with a play button in the upper left
*title
*Video Duration (MM:SS) and Date

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user have Autoplay video feature enabled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN video autoplays and audio will be MUTED by default

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user swipes left/right on the Videos module
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is able to successfully swipe over to the beginning/end of the video list (5 videos)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a Video in the Videos module
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video will launch in "Full Screen" mode
And the video will play successfully
And the video that plays will match up correctly to the thumbnail and title that was tapped 
And audio will be mute by default 
And Tapping on Video second time unmute the video 
OR user can MUTE/UNMUTE the audio using MUTE button

custom_steps_separated.content: When one video is finishes playing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video completes autoplay without any user interaction, the video should start over, from the beginning. If the user is a lite user, no additional ad should be shown.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is a lite user, a muted advertisement must play (if available) prior to autoplaying the video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Current advertising rules should apply to this placement

custom_steps_separated.content: When the video completes autoplay without any user interaction
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video should start over, from the beginning AND If the user is a lite user, no additional ad should be shown

custom_steps_separated.content: If the user vertically scrolls past the ad/video without any interaction, and then returns so that the ad/video is 50% in view
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the ad/video should resume from the beginning

custom_steps_separated.content: If the user horizontally scrolls in the carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the next video must begin autoplaying and the current video must stop autoplaying at the same time.

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user taps the 'See All' button above the Video module
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is taken to the Team's video index

custom_steps_separated.content: When user have selected On Mobile Dara and WiFi Connections for AUDIO/VIDEO Selection for Autoplay Video
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then video autoplays and there are no app crashes AND app behavior should be smooth AND Audio MUTED by default

custom_steps_separated.content: When user have selected On WiFi Connections Only for AUDIO/VIDEO Selection for Autoplay Video
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then video autoplays and there are no app crashes AND app behavior should be smooth AND audio MUTED by default

custom_steps_separated.content: When user have selected Never Autoplay Videos for AUDIO/VIDEO Selection for Autoplay Video
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then user won't be able to Autoplay video
AND user display with PLAY button to Manually PLAY video

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN lite user navigates to Team View and autoplay the video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN  muted advertisement play then complete with muted by default AND Video autoplays with muted by default

title: Team Video Index - iPhone only
custom_preconds:
Given user an iPhone with MLB app installed
User has set the Favorite Team 

https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/IAB-18841

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Newsreader
and taps the MLB menu button on top center of the News index page AND tap on a Team filter
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the filter will be set to all Team-specific  news
and articles displayed can be related to team

custom_steps_separated.content: When the Videos module of the Team page loads
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the videos from the team's video index

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Videos within the Video module
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN title, Video Duration and Date should be display

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user have Autoplay video feature enabled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN video autoplays and audio will be MUTED by default

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user scrolls up/down on the Videos module
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is able to successfully scroll up/down the beginning/end of the video list

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a Video in the Videos module
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video will launch in "Full Screen" mode
And the video will play successfully
And the video that plays will match up correctly to the thumbnail and title that was tapped 
And audio will be mute by default 
And Tapping on Video second time unmute the video 
OR user can MUTE/UNMUTE the audio using MUTE button

custom_steps_separated.content: When one video is finishes playing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video completes autoplay without any user interaction, the video should start over, from the beginning. If the user is a lite user, no additional ad should be shown.

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the next video in the list should begin autoplaying. This behavior should repeat as the user scrolls down the view

custom_steps_separated.content: When user have selected On Mobile Data and WiFi Connections for AUDIO/VIDEO Selection for Autoplay Video
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then video autoplays and there are no app crashes AND app behavior should be smooth AND Audio MUTED by default

custom_steps_separated.content: When user have selected On WiFi Connections Only for AUDIO/VIDEO Selection for Autoplay Video
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then video autoplays and there are no app crashes AND app behavior should be smooth AND audio MUTED by default

custom_steps_separated.content: When user have selected Never Autoplay Videos for AUDIO/VIDEO Selection for Autoplay Video
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then user won't be able to Autoplay video
AND user display with PLAY button to Manually PLAY video

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN lite user navigates to Team View and autoplay the video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN muted advertisement play then complete with muted by default AND Video autoplays with muted by default

title: Analytics - Video Playback, contentID and slug parameters
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user of the MLB app
custom_steps: WHEN video is played or autoplays from Team home, Scores tab, News/video tab or team video page (see all)
custom_expected:
THEN tracking calls will be made in the form:
trackAction: MLB At Bat : <Platform Name> : Video : Video <event type>
AND the following params will be sent:

video.slug - the last part of the video URL ex: "jp-crawford-walk-off-home-run”
video.contentId - ex: "d26c91c0-aa942393-b2f4f861-csvm-diamondx64-asset”

title: Analytics - Video Playback, autoplay and context parameters
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user of the MLB app
custom_steps: WHEN video is played or autoplays from Team home, Scores tab, News/video tab or team video page (see all)
custom_expected:
THEN tracking calls will be made in the form:
trackAction: MLB At Bat : <Platform Name> : Video : Video <event type>
AND the following params will be sent:

video.autoplay : Video Autoplay Flag: true/false
video.context : Video Context. Where the video is being played/accessed in the app - probably mostly from the video/news tab and the home page

Expected Video Contexts for Team, Scoreboard, and News:
Team Home
Team Home : More Videos
Gameday Wrap
Gameday : Summary : Scoring
Gameday : Summary : All Plays
Gameday : Videos
News Videos
